title.narrative: PK Sindh Irrigated Agriculture Productivity Enhancement Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to improve irrigation water management at tertiary and field level in Sindh.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Adoption of Annual Work Plans and Budgets | Description : | Frequency :Yearly
